returns._0: True if available, false if already taken

returns.claimedAt: The timestamp when the subdomain was claimed
returns.credentialId: The passkey credential ID for recovery

returns._0: The Gardener account address that owns this subdomain

register(string,address,bytes32).details: Only callable by the Gardener account itself (msg.sender == owner)

params.credentialId: WebAuthn credential ID for passkey recovery
params.name: The subdomain name (e.g., "alice" for alice.greengoods.eth)

available(string).notice: Check if a subdomain name is available

getRecoveryData(string).notice: Get recovery data for a subdomain

ownerOf(string).notice: Get the owner of a subdomain

register(string,address,bytes32).notice: Register a subdomain for a Gardener account with passkey recovery data

resolve(string).notice: Resolve a subdomain name to an address
